descriptionHtml:
Darksiders Open-claws (Fist of War)


[size=4]Disclaimer: Images on the screenshots are custom-made textures coupled with a piece of armor that i found on a japanese site, also modified by me, to fit. Therefore, you won't find them anyway but inside my harddrive. [color=#ff0000] Don't ask how to get. they are personal.[/color]

The mod was upload as-is, provided by Drk937 back then.
[/size]
====
[size=3]Try these mods out!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67587/?]Throwing Battleaxe[/url] for badass.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67904/?]Battlemage Staves[/url] for epic staves battle.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16127/?]Arcane Fist - Unarmed Spell Combat[/url] for arcane monk.[/size]
====
[color=yellow] Note: The first 3 screenshots are just teaser you won't actually found them. They're my personal textures. [/color]
Firstly, this mod doesnt belong to me, Drk937 own it
Secondly, it appear that the mod is working for some and others not. All I can say is to check if you have downloaded properly.
Lastly, This is an [size=3] ARMOR [/size] and not a weapon


***
[size=4][font=impact]Description[/font][/size]:
Add 2 type of gauntlets:
-An open-claw
-A closed-fist like

How to get:
you can craft it in the Dragonbone section

***
According to Drk937 this mod is free for all
So feel free to reuse it at your will :)

Credit
Thank to a friend from the community for the second version
Drk937 & Xelus
Bethesda Softwork
author: Drk937
